trans-unit.source: Defines the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicates the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: 定义对象标识符 (OID) 的集合，该对象标识符指示使用密钥的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: An enhanced key usage (EKU) extension is a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: 增强型密钥用法 (EKU) 扩展为指示使用密钥的应用程序的对象标识符 (Oid) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>类来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建的新实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>类。

trans-unit.source: After the instance has been created, you can then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A> property to obtain the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: 创建实例后，你可以使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension.EnhancedKeyUsages%2A>属性来获取对象标识符 (Oid) 指示使用密钥的应用程序的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>类来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建扩展的编码数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展是必不可少的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> 对象和一个标识扩展是否重要的值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create the extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，如果要创建扩展的信息已处于<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展是必不可少的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> 和一个标识扩展是否重要的值来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> contains one or more corrupt values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> 包含一个或多个损坏的值。

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建扩展的编码数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 对象初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of object identifiers (OIDs) that indicate the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: 获取对象标识符 (OID) 的集合，该集合指示使用密钥的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> object indicating the applications that use the key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection" /> 对象，指示使用密钥的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to open a user’s personal certificate store and display information about each certificate in the store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何打开用户的个人证书存储并在存储区中显示有关每个证书的信息。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension> class to display the information.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509EnhancedKeyUsageExtension>类来显示信息。
